Text: Someone keeps talking in the background whats up with that?
Descriptive audio in the background. Look elsewhere if you don't want the distraction.
WHEN YOU POST AN EPISODE WITH THAT ANNOYING COMMENTARY FOR THE DEAF, PLEASE PROVIDE SOME SORT OF INDICATION

This version's soundtrack is English for the vision-impaired.  In addition to the dialogue and normal soundtrack, there is a narrator describing details that would help a vision-impaired person appreciate the show.
